name: Cards On Adventure
description:
Fight with your cards along the way to the glory!

Cards On Adventure offers 5 classes, 10 skills, 10 classes+attribute possibbilities, and tons of fun!

The cards in the frontline protect the backline: cards in the backline take the half of the damage!

Next features: BGM and Sounds; UI and Illustrations; Android Build; custom battles, custom rewards to battles, some nice ending to the game, and maybe more.

Uses third party asset on all BGM and SFX.
